title.rendered: Cybersecurity Awareness Month: How to Build a Culture of Cybersecurity – Webinar Recording

content.rendered:
Cybersecurity Awareness Month: How to Build a Culture of Cybersecurity – Webinar Recording

For Cybersecurity Awareness Month, we’re exploring practical steps to build a strong culture of cybersecurity in your organization.

From empowering employees with best practices to developing leadership strategies that prioritize cybersecurity, we’ll show you how to create a security-first mindset at every level.

Learn how to reduce human error, improve security hygiene, and align your team’s efforts with your company’s broader cybersecurity goals. This webinar will help boost your organization’s resilience in today’s evolving threat landscape!

Explore:

  • How to make your cybersecurity awareness program effective
  • How to build a cybersecurity culture from the top down
  • How to motivate the adoption of your cybersecurity tool
  • What to consider when partnering with cybersecurity vendors


About our presenters: Ted Hulsy, CRO for Snap Tech IT and a technology veteran of over two decades will be joined by cybersecurity awareness expert, Nathan Caldwell. Nathan was responsible for originating and bringing a game-changing cybersecurity awareness solution to market.

excerpt.rendered: A culture of cybersecurity doesn’t just happen. Learn how to build a culture of cybersecurity in your organization by watching our on-demand webinar.
